thread.title_full: Gabrielle is supporting Michael Bolton on his UK tour next year - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Ben Lee
title: Gabrielle is supporting Michael Bolton on his UK tour next year - Music
text: Gabrielle is to support Michael Bolton on his UK headline tour next year.The 'Rise' singer will join Bolton as he performs across the country in April 2016, visiting cities including Nottingham, Cardiff, Manchester and Glasgow. © Yui Mok / PA Images Bolton and Gabrielle are also playing at London's Royal Albert Hall."I'm thrilled to be coming back to the UK in April," said Bolton. "My fans have been so supportive, and it's one of my favourite places to tour."We have a few surprises this time around, with some music from the new album and special guests that I'm excited to share with everyone." © Todd Williamson / AP/Press Association Images Tickets go on sale this Friday (October 16).Michael Bolton's April UK tour dates in full:6 - Nottingham, Royal Concert Hall8 - Birmingham, Symphony Hall10 - Brighton, Dome12 - Bristol, Colston Hall14 - Cardiff, St David's Hall16 - Bournemouth, International Centre18 - Manchester, O2 Apollo20 - Newcastle, City Hall22 - Glasgow, Clyde Auditorium24 - Sheffield, City Hall26 - Southend, Cliffs Pavilion28 - London, Royal Albert Hall30 - Liverpool, Philharmonic Hall
